name: Goshawk
description:
The 2022 Unofficial Commodore Sequel to Yars' Revenge '81

This "inspired" work merely alludes to the dark empire of the Qotile, where you will have to contend and manage 2 side-assaulting laser cannons in your speedy dart craft but also marauding menaces from above in a frantic frenzy to procure cosmic gypsum.

We thought the dark was gone, but we soon learning the past couple years that these forces were hibernating, planning and once again executing our world demise.

This is initial support limited paid option for a poor S.O.B. Will update and optional free/donate later.

** If you choose to support this game - just remember that you ARE WELCOME to email direct anytime for updates, help or secret special stuff requests anytime - direct from our bitbucket or emails that will be online forevvvverrrrrr. **

:.

This game of course requires C64 emulator VICE available, easily and quickly on any extant OS and device for free.

If you have any issue, I can of course help you to 100% become an expert in < than 1 hour via email to become a master of playing and using Commodore 64 on the systems: real hardware C64/128; PC/WIN/LINUX. Don't be intimidated to ask for help if you need it. Glad to help and add fun, happiness and knowledge to your life.

For time being, for support or anything else, send an message to "MO" here: 

https://kraksnax.bitbucket.io/
